00002 // Define Kinematics class
00004 
00006 //Class Constructor
00007 Kinematics::Kinematics(ModelPlane * parent)
00008 {
00009         parentObj = parent; // ModelPlane class pointer
00010         forceInput.x = 0;
00011         forceInput.y = 0;
00012         forceInput.z = 0;
00013         torqueInput.x = 0;
00014         torqueInput.y = 0;
00015         torqueInput.z = 0;
00016         // Read kinematics related parameters from parameter server
00017         if(!ros::param::getCached("airframe/m", mass)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -m- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00018         double j_x, j_y, j_z, j_xz;
00019         if(!ros::param::getCached("airframe/j_x", j_x)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -j_x- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00020         if(!ros::param::getCached("airframe/j_y", j_y)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -j_y- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00021         if(!ros::param::getCached("airframe/j_z", j_z)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -j_z- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00022         if(!ros::param::getCached("airframe/j_xz", j_xz)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -j_xz- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00023 
00024         // Calculate inertia matrix...
00025         double G = j_x*j_z-pow(j_xz,2);
00026         J[0] = j_x; J[1] = 0; J[2] = -j_xz;
00027         J[3] = 0; J[4] = j_y; J[5] = 0;
00028         J[6] = -j_xz; J[7] = 0; J[8] = j_z;
00029         // ... and its iverse
00030         Jinv[0] = j_z/G; Jinv[1] = 0; Jinv[2] = j_xz/G;
00031         Jinv[3] = 0; Jinv[4] = 1/j_y; Jinv[5] = 0;
00032         Jinv[6] = j_xz/G; Jinv[7] = 0; Jinv[8] = j_x/G;
00033         // Create a Factory object and make it build an integrator
00034         Factory factory;
00035         integrator = factory.buildIntegrator(parentObj);
00036 }
00037 
00039 //Class Destructor
00040 Kinematics::~Kinematics()
00041 {
00042         delete integrator;
00043         delete parentObj;
00044 }
00045 
00047 //State derivatives calculation
00048 void Kinematics::calcDerivatives()
00049 {
00050         // variable declaration
00051         geometry_msgs::Vector3 tempVect;
00052         double Reb[9];
00053 
00054         // create transformation matrix from state orientation quaternion
00055         quat2rotmtx (parentObj->states.pose.orientation, Reb);
00056 
00057         // create position derivatives from earth velocity
00058         posDot = Reb*parentObj->states.velocity.linear;
00059 
00060         // create body velocity derivatives from acceleration, angular rotation and body velocity
00061         linearAcc = (1.0/mass)*forceInput;
00062         geometry_msgs::Vector3 corriolisAcc;
00063         vector3_cross(-parentObj->states.velocity.angular, parentObj->states.velocity.linear, &corriolisAcc);
00064         speedDot = linearAcc + corriolisAcc;
00065 
00066         // create angular derivatives quaternion from angular rates
00067         quatDot.w = 1.0;
00068         quatDot.x = parentObj->states.velocity.angular.x*0.5*parentObj->dt;
00069         quatDot.y = parentObj->states.velocity.angular.y*0.5*parentObj->dt;
00070         quatDot.z = parentObj->states.velocity.angular.z*0.5*parentObj->dt;
00071 
00072         // create angular rate derivatives from torque
00073         vector3_cross(parentObj->states.velocity.angular, J*parentObj->states.velocity.angular, &tempVect);
00074         tempVect = -tempVect+torqueInput;
00075         rateDot = Jinv*tempVect;
00076 }

00083 {
00084         parentObj = parent; // ModelPlane class pointer

00087 Integrator::~Integrator()
00088 {
00089         delete parentObj;
00090 }

00097 ForwardEuler::ForwardEuler(ModelPlane * parent) : Integrator(parent)

00099 }

00101 //Propagation of the states
00102 void ForwardEuler::propagation()
00103 {
00104         geometry_msgs::Vector3 tempVect;
00105 
00106         // Propagate the NED coordinates from earth velocity
00107         parentObj->states.pose.position.x = parentObj->states.pose.position.x + parentObj->kinematics.posDot.x * parentObj->dt;
00108         parentObj->states.pose.position.y = parentObj->states.pose.position.y + parentObj->kinematics.posDot.y * parentObj->dt;
00109         parentObj->states.pose.position.z = parentObj->states.pose.position.z + parentObj->kinematics.posDot.z * parentObj->dt;
00110 
00111         // Propagate orientation quaternion from angular derivatives quaternion
00112         geometry_msgs::Quaternion quat = parentObj->states.pose.orientation;
00113         quat_product(quat,parentObj->kinematics.quatDot,&(parentObj->states.pose.orientation));
00114         quat_normalize(&(parentObj->states.pose.orientation));
00115 
00116         // Propagate body velocity from body velocity derivatives
00117         tempVect = parentObj->dt*parentObj->kinematics.speedDot;
00118         parentObj->states.velocity.linear = parentObj->states.velocity.linear + tempVect;
00119 
00120         // Propagates angular velocity from angular derivatives
00121         tempVect = parentObj->dt*parentObj->kinematics.rateDot;
00122         parentObj->states.velocity.angular = parentObj->states.velocity.angular + tempVect;
00123 
00124         // Set linear acceleration from the speed derivatives
00125         parentObj->states.acceleration.linear = parentObj->kinematics.speedDot;
00126 
00127         // Set angular acceleration from the angular rate derivatives
00128         parentObj->states.acceleration.angular = parentObj->kinematics.rateDot;
00129 
00130         //Update Geoid stuff using the NED coordinates
00131         parentObj->states.geoid.latitude += 180.0/M_PI*asin(parentObj->kinematics.posDot.x * parentObj->dt / WGS84_RM(parentObj->states.geoid.latitude));
00132         parentObj->states.geoid.longitude += 180.0/M_PI*asin(parentObj->kinematics.posDot.y * parentObj->dt / WGS84_RN(parentObj->states.geoid.longitude));
00133         parentObj->states.geoid.altitude += -parentObj->kinematics.posDot.z * parentObj->dt;
00134         parentObj->states.geoid.velocity.x = parentObj->kinematics.posDot.x;
00135         parentObj->states.geoid.velocity.y = parentObj->kinematics.posDot.y;
00136         parentObj->states.geoid.velocity.z = -parentObj->kinematics.posDot.z; // Upwards velocity
00137 }
